CustomField.description: Indicates if the change was an increase or decrease
CustomField.formula: IF( SVMXC__New_Quantity2__c > SVMXC__Old_Quantity2__c , "Increase", IF( SVMXC__Old_Quantity2__c > SVMXC__New_Quantity2__c , "Decrease", "") )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Indicates if the change was an increase or decrease
CustomField.label: Change Type
